      • Group

        public Group​(java.lang.String name,
             RegisteredUser representative,
             Group parent)
        Group constructor
        Parameters:
        name - String with the name of the Project
        representative - RegisteredUser that is the creator and first member of the group
        parent - Group that is the parent of the group that is being created (if there is one)
